title: How can i play PBE ? I mean , where i can register to be able to play PBE  ?
body: How can i play PBE ? I mean , where i can register to be able to play PBE  ? Or i can play with my normal League of Legens account ?

replies.body:
[Click me!](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)

You'll need to apply for a PBE account. This account is different from your live account.
I tried applying but it says something went wrong :c
Oh! It looks like we're investigating an issue that's preventing players from completing the application process. We're working to get this back up and running ASAP!

Will you guys be approving anymore PBE applications anytime soon or are you done with them. Cause my brother sent one out back in December or January I can't remember which and he never got approved. While I applied for one not log before him and got one about a month later.

The main reason I'm asking is that I have no one to help do any play testing with since I have like two people added and I never see them on. If he had it things would be so much easier for me.

To the best of my knowledge, we do still accept waves of players in periodically. 

As far as not having anyone to play test with, I'd suggest joining the "Public Beta" chat room on PBE. There are always players in there - many who are also looking to test something, or who are willing to help lend a hand.
Click the drop down on you profile in the top right of page then click PBE. Follow the steps it gives.
